metadata.summary: Instructions for applying contracted custom pricing plans when creating organizations via Web UI, REST API, or Python SDK
metadata.primary_use_case: Apply pre-negotiated custom pricing to new organizations to receive contracted discount rates

cross_refs.description: Understanding standard pricing helps contextualize benefits of custom billing plans
Custom plans are separate from default and unified billing options but may be combined with unified billing
